ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not. Also, I m wondering... since we re talking about quests here.  When you talk to the guard and he tells you about his daughter Lucie.  Is this one of
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not.

Also, I'm wondering... since we're talking about quests here. When you talk to the guard and he tells you about his daughter Lucie. Is this one of the myraid of broken quests? I went into the area of the Aquaducts that they were speaking about, but just walked in circles and got annoyed. I checked the walls for any that were illusions but didn't find any, though I guess I could've missed a section. Any idea about this one?

If the message is going to give any thing about a quest away, then the author can just add [Quest Info] or [Q.Info] in the subject. That'll let people know who don't want to have anything given away, that they shouldn't read that particuler message. Just an idea.

Enjoy folks, like the list.

~Myskyra / Tunare
----- Original Message -----
From: Heath Barker
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 10:07 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] (no subject)


Wow as the subscriber count climbs I would like to take this chance to welcome all to the list.
Is anyone against the sharing of Quest information in this list?

Heath
Aarkon Erudite on Povar
